biotools.summary: F-seq is a software package that generates a continuous tag sequence density estimation based on tag sequencing to identify specific sequence features such as transcription factor binding sites (ChI-seq) or regions of open chromatin (DNase-seq).

bioschemas.name: F-seq
bioschemas.summary: F-seq is a software package that generates a continuous tag sequence density estimation based on tag sequencing to identify specific sequence features such as transcription factor binding sites (ChI-seq) or regions of open chromatin (DNase-seq).
